Plot: After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.
Title: The Other Woman
Actors: Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Don Johnson
tomatoConsensus: The Other Woman definitely boasts a talented pedigree, but all that skill is never fully brought to bear on a story that settles for cheap laughs instead of reaching its empowering potential.
